column2: "Afei Nebat ne ba ɔhen Jeroboam n’afe a otsia duawɔtwe no mu nna Abijam hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Juda do."
"Mfe ebiasa na ɔdze dzii hen wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Maaka
column3: Absalom ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔnantsewee wɔ n’egya no bɔn a ɔyɛe no wɔ n’enyim no nyinara mu: na n’akoma enndzi mu wɔ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn enyim
column3: dɛ n’egya David n’akoma."

column2: "Naaso osian David ntsi na EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn maa kandzea wɔ Jerusalɛm
column3: dɛ ɔbɛma ne ba do esi hɔ wɔ n’ekyir

column2: "osiandɛ David yɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do
column3: na oemmfi adze biara a ɔhyɛɛ no no ho ɔanndan ammfa nkyɛn wɔ no nkwa nda nyinara mu
column4: gyedɛ Hitinyi Uria asɛm no nko mu."

column2: "Afei akodzi daa Rehoboam na Jeroboam ntamu wɔ no nkwa nda nyinara mu."
"Na Abijam no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe no nyinara
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu a? Na akodzi daa Abijam na Jeroboam ntamu."

column2: "Na Abijam kɔr ne nsamankyir; na wosiee no wɔ David kurow no mu: na ne babanyin Asa na odzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."
"Na Israelhen Jeroboam n’afe a otsia eduonu no mu na Asa hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Juda do."
"Na mfe eduanan biako na ɔdze dzii hen wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Maaka
column3: Absalom ne babaa a."

column2: "Na Asa yɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n’egya David yɛe."

column2: "Na otutuu sodomfo ndwaman no fii asaase no do
column3: na oyiyii abosom a n’egyanom yɛe no nyinara wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na ne na Maaka so otuu no do dɛ ɔyɛ ɔhembaa
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛɛ ekyiwadze honyi bi maa Asera ntsi; na Asa twaa no honyi no
column4: na ɔkɛhyeew no wɔ ɔwora Kidron do."

column2: "Na mbeambea sorɔnsorɔm no dze oennyiyi: naaso Asa n’akoma dzii mu wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: ne nda nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔdze ndzɛmba a n’egya tui sii hɔ
column3: na ndzɛmba a nankasa tui sii hɔ no baa EWURADZE fie

column2: "Na akodzi daa Asa na Israelhen Baasha ntamu hɔn nda nyinara."
"Na Israelhen Baasha fowee kɔr Juda do
column3: na ɔkɛkyekyeer Rama
column4: dɛ ɔremma kwan ma obiara nndzi ndɔfir wɔ Judahen Asa nkyɛn."

column2: "Nna Asa faa dwetɛ na sika a wogyaa no wɔ EWURADZE ne fie akoradze mu nyinara
column3: na ɔhen no ne fie akoradze no
column4: na ɔdze hyɛɛ n’akowaa nsa: na ɔhen Asa somaa ma wɔdze kɔr Hezion ba Tabrimon ba Ben-hadad
column5: Siriahen a ɔtse Damaskɔs no nkyɛn
column8: "Nkyekyeree bi da emi na ɔwo ntamu
column9: wɔ m’egya na w’egya ntamu: hwɛ
column10: mama wɔdze dwetɛ na sika ayɛyɛdze rebrɛ wo; kɔ
column11: kɛtsetsew ɔwo nye Israelhen Baasha nkyekyeree no mu

column2: "Na Ben-hadad tsiee ɔhen Asa
column3: na ɔsomaa no dɔm do asafohemfo no wɔ Israel nkurow no do

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Baasha tsee no

column2: "Nna ɔhen Asa maa wɔbɔɔ dawur wɔ Juda nyinara a woennyi obiara wɔ mu: na wɔkɔsoaa Rama abo
column3: na no ho ndua no a Baasha dze kyekyeree no; na ɔhen Asa dze kyekyeer Benjamin Geba

column2: "Afei Asa no ho nsɛm nyinara
column3: na ne ndam nyinara
column4: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara na nkurow a ɔkyekyeree no
column5: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu a? Na mbom no nkɔdaaber mu no ɔyaar n’anan."

column2: "Na Asa kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ n’egyanom nkyɛn wɔ n’egya David kurow no mu: na ne babanyin Jehosafat na odzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Na Jeroboam ne ba Nadab hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel do wɔ Judahen Asa n’afe a otsia ebien no mu
column3: na odzii hen wɔ Israel do mfe ebien."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: na ɔnantseew n’egya no kwan
column4: na ne ndzeyɛɛ a ɔdze maa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no mu."

column2: "Na Ahija ne ba Baasha a ofi Isakar fie no paam ne tsir do; na Baasha bɔɔ no wɔ Gibeton a ɔyɛ Filistiafo dze no do; osiandɛ nna Nadab na Israel nyinara worutua Gibeton."
"Mekyerɛ Judahen Asa n’afe a otsia ebiasa no mu na Baasha kum no na odzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ obedzii hen no ara pɛr
column3: nna ɔtɔr Jeroboam fi nyinara; oenngyaa obiara a ogu ahom amma Jeroboam dze kodur dɛ ɔsɛɛ no pasaa; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔnam n’akowaa Silohnyi Ahija n’abaw do kae no tse no:"

column2: "osian Jeroboam no bɔn a ɔyɛe
column3: na ɔdze maa Israel so yɛɛ bɔn no ntsi; osian yi a oyii EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no ebufuw no ntsi."

column2: "Afei Nadab no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na akodzi daa Asa na Israelhen Baasha ntamu hɔn nda nyinara."
"Judahen Asa n’afe a otsia ebiasa no mu na Ahija ne babanyin Baasha hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel nyinara do wɔ Tirza
column3: na odzii hen mfe eduonu anan."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: na ɔnantseew Jeroboam no kwan do
column4: na ne ndzeyɛɛ a ɔdze maa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no mu."
